text.title: Aberdeen (South Dakota)
text.head: Aberdeen (South Dakota)
text.p: Aberdeen is a city in South Dakota. It is home to Northern State University.
text.head: Get in
By plane

list.item: Aberdeen Regional Airport ( ABR ). Features several flights a day operated by Delta Air Lines. Daily flights connect to Minneapolis, Minnesota.

text.head: By bus
text.p: Aberdeen is served by Jefferson Lines.
text.head: Get around
text.p: There is very little public transportation available in Aberdeen, so transportation relies on cars. Rental vehicles are the best means of travel in Aberdeen, as the cab system is somewhat sketchy.
text.head: See
Do
Buy
Eat
text.p: The city's best restaurants include Minervas located at the Ramkota Best Western Hotel, Maverick's steak house, and the Flame located on Main Street. The Brass Kettle, also on Main Street, opened in 2015 and offers house-grown greens, high-quality entrees and handmade desserts.
